from Dean Menon   Why Stern?   By The Numbers   Social Media   News & Events   NYU Stern Street Team     Academics Business Degree   Business & Political Economy Degree   Faculty   Academic Advising   Research   Practitioners Seminar   Stern Bulletin     Stern Around the World International Studies Program   Business & Political Economy Degree Program   Short-Term Immersions   Semester Away     Social Impact Social Impact Curriculum   Social Impact Initiatives     Dynamic Community Building Community   Living & Learning in New York City   Leadership Initiatives   Student Clubs and Organizations     Future Success Professional Development   Internships & Careers     Admissions Financial Aid   Transfer Applicants   Apply               Home / Programs & Admissions / Undergraduate / The Stern Advantage                        Share / Print                Print      Email      Share       Like                                                                   Take Action                     Visit Our Campus    Apply to NYU Stern    Stay Connected                                The Stern Advantage      Gain an outstanding education . Take courses in our rigorous and innovative curriculum, and select from liberal arts electives throughout NYU. Learn from business leaders on campus and at their places of business.    Achieve global awareness and a sophisticated worldview . Choose from an unsurpassed variety of options for international immersion. Gain a social mindset and a sense of professional responsibility while giving back locally and abroad.    Get involved in our community . Join clubs and organizations representing every interest imaginable. Connect, make friends, explore new talents, and build leadership skills.    Take advantage of all that NYC has to offer . Explore career directions through internships offered by thousands of companies based in New York. Experience art, music, and theater. Enjoy the fun, energy, and excitement of living in the business and cultural capital of the world.                                           Did you know Stern has...      24 Stern specific clubs    88% of students holding part-time jobs/internships    18 partner business schools around the globe    200 internationally recognized scholars of the Stern faculty                     Why Stern?   Top Ten Reasons                                                                The Stern Advantage     Message from Dean Menon   Why Stern? October Spotlight: The Global Advantage | NYU Wasserman Center Blog                                                                                                                                          NYU Wasserman Center Blog                    The Center for Career Development                                                                           Skip to content            Home   Events   Contact us   About   Main Site                                                                                          ← What’s Next Series: Choosing A Major        Meet the Global Peers: Prague →                    October Spotlight: The Global Advantage                 Posted on October 8, 2012  by heathert  | Leave a comment                             This month is all about the global advantage! NYU offers over a dozen different international study away locations to provide you with the ultimate global experience .   To kick off the conversation about the advantages of studying away, here’s a Wassertube video spotlighting insights from our employer partners and NYU students:     If coming to NYC for your education is a part of your global experience, then attend the international  student orientation through the Office of International Students & Scholars (OISS) to make the most of your time here at NYU!                                                                                                                        Tweet     Related posts:   How to Tuesday GLOBAL: Tips for International Interviews and Job Searches                             This entry was posted in diversity , Global , International Students and tagged global experience , international , study away .
